data.text: @PublicHealthW Will @PrifWeinidog be true to his word and “follow the science” in a couple of weeks time ? Didn’t open up last week to be different to Westminster but will he drop all restrictions in a fortnight if the 7 day case rate continues to rise. Using dates not data #NoMandates

@purnell78 @PublicHealthW Fair point.  But those pushing the jab would include people you interact with every day.  Unfortunately. And they’ve yet to put 2 & 2 together. Friends, workmates, relatives, employers etc.  Not just the likes of Drakeford etc.

@PublicHealthW Covid infections in Britain are rising again, and 90 percent of the dead are vaccinated.
 Have mRNA jabs ruined our chance at herd immunity?
@PublicHealthW I didn't realise covid was still a thing here, as I now go over to Chester to to my business.
@PublicHealthW Seems nature brought us a minimally damaging virus. Evolution & human adaptation is incredible.

@PublicHealthW When are we going to see people brought to justice for the criminal behaviour all through this covid tyranny especially all those who pushed the clot shot which is clear as day now is the most deadly and damaging injection ever to rammed into the arms of millions. Pfizer document
